title: Case-Based Mathematical Modeling: Healthcare Field Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Learners solve real clinical problems through mathematical modeling projects involving medical data analysis. Utilizes case scenarios reflecting patient diversity and interdisciplinary collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can build differential equation-based disease progression models using real-world medical datasets.
Learners can propose optimization solutions for medical resource allocation problems and perform cost-effectiveness analysis.
Learners can collaborate with multidisciplinary team members to develop personalized treatment plan models reflecting individual patient characteristics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
